ViewObject.Name: ODEBillConfigDetailsFieldNamesPVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT val.source_value2 field_name, val.source_value1 field_id, val.target_value1 data_type, val.target_value2 data_format, null cust_doc_id, 1 TranslationField, DECODE(val.target_value20, 'Lines', 'LINE', val.target_value20) record_type, val.enabled_flag enabledflag FROM xx_fin_translatedefinition def, xx_fin_translatevalues val WHERE def.translate_id = val.translate_id AND def.translation_name = 'XX_CDH_EBL_TXT_DET_FIELDS' -- AND val.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND val.source_value1 IS NOT NULL AND val.source_value2 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xcetd.label field_name, CAST (xcetd.FIELD_ID AS VARCHAR2(240)) field_id, NULL data_type, NULL data_format, xcetd.cust_doc_id, 0 TranslationField, record_type, null enabledflag FROM XX_CDH_EBL_TEMPL_DTL_TXT xcetd WHERE not exists (SELECT 1 FROM xx_fin_translatedefinition def, xx_fin_translatevalues val WHERE def.translate_id = val.translate_id AND def.translation_name = 'XX_CDH_EBL_TXT_DET_FIELDS' --AND val.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND val.source_value1 IS NOT NULL AND val.source_value2 IS NOT NULL and val.source_value1=xcetd.FIELD_ID ) and label is not null and exists (select 1 from XX_CDH_EBL_concat_fields_TXT xcect where xcect.conc_field_id =xcetd.field_id and xcect.cust_doc_id=xcetd.cust_doc_id and xcect.tab='D' union select 1 from XX_CDH_EBL_split_fields_TXT xcest where xcest.split_field_id =xcetd.split_field_id and xcest.cust_doc_id=xcetd.cust_doc_id )
